item.title: Tax and Price Updates for Apps, In-App Purchases, and Subscriptions
item.dc:creator: MichaÅ‚ Rutkowski

ğŸŒ The App Store is adjusting prices for apps and in-app purchases due to recent tax and exchange rate changes. ğŸ“… As of August 21, updates include new VAT rates in Estonia and Romania, along with a digital services tax removal in Canada. The Philippines and Vietnam have introduced new VAT and personal income tax rates for developers. ğŸ”„ Starting September 8, pricing updates will occur for apps not using the Philippines or Vietnam as their base storefront.
